sentences.sContent: Xenon and krypton are not retained by the body so they have little effect.
sentences.sContent_eng: Xenon and krypton are not retained by the body so they have little effect.
sentences.sCn: 氙和氪不能在人体内停留所以对人体影响很小。

sentences.sContent: The krypton and xenon isotope ratios in the gas samples provided a surprising result: They did not match the ratios found in the primordial cloud that spawned the solar system.
sentences.sContent_eng: The krypton and xenon isotope ratios in the gas samples provided a surprising result: They did not match the ratios found in the primordial cloud that spawned the solar system.
sentences.sCn: 气体采样中的氪和氙同位素比值产生了一个令人吃惊的结果：这些比值跟在形成太阳系的原始云团中所发现的比值不一致。

trans.tranOther: Krypton is an element that is found in the air in the form of a gas. It is used in fluorescent lights and lasers.
